Name: The Adventures of Wolf and Hood - A Jigsaw Tale
About the game: The Adventures of Wolf and Hood - A Jigsaw Tale is a wonderfully original fairy tale story told through 20 beautiful hand illustrated jigsaw puzzles. Follow familiar fairy tale characters in a brand new adventure Choose from six different puzzle sizes, from 24 to 294 pieces Progress is saved automatically so you can come back to a puzzle later Take your time to admire the completed scenes and zoom in on the details Subtle animated elements bring the scenes to life as you play The most realistic looking puzzle pieces found in any jigsaw puzzle game Very satisfying sound effects recorded from real jigsaw puzzles for an authentic experience Read the whole completed story in Gallery Mode, like a real picture book Every scene in the story has an animated element for you to find. Some are easy to spot but others are much more subtle and will take a keen eye to track down.
